snippet: The Legal Aid Society says that the police are overzealously enforcing lewdness laws and, as a result, are arresting innocent men.
abstract: Plain clothes police officers patrolling Port Authority Bus Terminal men's room are arresting an average of two people per week on charges of public lewdness or exposure, accusing most of them of masturbating at urinals; several of those arrested are represented by Legal Aid Society, which maintains men are innocent victims of aggressive and intrusive police tactics.
lead_paragraph: The Legal Aid Society says that the police are overzealously enforcing lewdness laws and, as a result, are arresting innocent men.
